source_sentence: 大唐三藏沙門義淨奉　制譯
translation: translated by the Tripiṭaka Master Yijingfeng, a great Tang sanzang ascetic

source_sentence: 四天王護國品第十二
translation: Chapter 12 of the chapter on the protection of the kingdoms by the four heavenly kings

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊聞四天王恭敬供養《金光明經》，及能擁護諸持經者，讚言：「善哉！
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān heard the four heavenly kings venerate and make offerings to the Sutra of Golden Light, and those who can embrace the maintainers of the sūtras praise it, saying, Good!

source_sentence: 善哉！
translation: Excellent, good!

source_sentence: 汝等四王已於過去無量百千萬億佛所，恭敬供養，尊重讚歎，植諸善根，
translation: You four kings have already honored, served, venerated, and praised immeasurable hundreds of thousands of myriads of koṭis of buddhas of the past. planted roots of goodness in them.

source_sentence: 修行正法，常說正法，以法化世。
translation: He cultivates the right teaching, always explains the right teaching, and uses the teaching to transform the world.

source_sentence: 汝等長夜於諸眾生常思利益，起大慈心，願與安樂，以是因緣，能令汝等現受勝報。
translation: For a long time you have always thought of all living beings for their benefit. With great compassion and wishing to give them peace and happiness, through these causes and conditions you will be able to receive the excellent reward in this life.

source_sentence: 若有人王恭敬供養此《金光明》最勝經典，汝等應當勤加守護，令得安隱。
translation: If there are people who the king respects and venerates this most excellent scripture of the Golden Light, you should diligently guard it so that they can attain peace.

source_sentence: 汝諸四王及餘眷屬無量無數百千藥叉護是經者，即是護持去、來、現在諸佛正法。
translation: Countless hundreds of thousands of you four kings and other members of your retinues protect this sūtra, which is the right teaching of the buddhas of past, future, and present.

source_sentence: 汝等四王及餘天眾并諸藥叉，與阿蘇羅共鬪戰時，常得勝利；
translation: You four kings, other celestial beings and yakṣas will always be victorious when you fight with the asuras.

source_sentence: 汝等若能護持是經，由經力故，能除眾苦、怨賊、飢饉及諸疾疫。
translation: If you can preserve this sūtra, it's because of the power of the sūtra that you'll be able to remove suffering, enemies, thieves, hunger, and epidemics of illness.

source_sentence: 是故汝等若見四眾受持讀誦此經王者，亦應勤心共加守護，為除衰惱，
translation: Therefore, if you see the fourfold assembly of monks who preserve and recite this sutra to the king, you should also exert yourselves in guarding it so as to remove its decay.

source_sentence: 施與安樂。」
translation: Giving gives peace and comfort.

source_sentence: 爾時，四天王即從座起，偏袒右肩，右膝著地，合掌恭敬白佛言：「世尊！
translation: At that point, the four celestial kings rose from their seats, bared their right shoulders, knelt with their right knees on the ground, joined their palms in respect, and said to the Buddha, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 此《金光明最勝經王》，於未來世，若有國土城邑聚落、山林曠野，隨所至處流布之時，
translation: In the future, if there were lands, cities, towns, villages, mountains, forests, and wilderness, wherever they might go to disseminate this book,

source_sentence: 若彼國王於此經典至心聽受，稱歎供養，并復供給受持是經四部之眾，
translation: If the king of that country wholeheartedly listens to this scripture, praises and venerates it as an offering, and also provides support for the four groups of people who preserve this scripture.

source_sentence: 深心擁護，令離衰惱，以是因緣，我護彼王及諸人眾，皆令安隱，遠離憂苦，
translation: Because of these causes and conditions, I protect the king and his people so that they will all be at ease and free from sorrow and suffering.

source_sentence: 增益壽命，威德具足。
translation: They increase their life spans and are endowed with authoritative virtue.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若彼國王見於四眾受持經者，恭敬守護猶如父母，一切所須悉皆供給，
translation: If the king of that country sees anyone among the fourfold assembly who preserves the scriptures, he honors and protects them as if they were his parents. He provides for all their needs.

source_sentence: 我等四王常為守護，令諸有情無不尊敬。
translation: We four kings always protect them, so that all sentient beings will not fail to venerate them.

source_sentence: 是故我等并與無量藥叉諸神，隨此經王所流布處，潛身擁護，令無留難，
translation: That is why we and the innumerable other yakṣa spirits, accompanied by myself and myriad other yakṣa spirits, concealed our bodies so that no one could harm us.

source_sentence: 亦當護念聽是經人諸國王等，除其衰患，悉令安隱，他方怨賊皆使退散。
translation: You should also guard your thoughts and listen to this sūtra, so that the kings of people and countries who hear it will be freed from their afflictions, made comfortable, and all the enemies and thieves in other directions will retreat.

source_sentence: 若有人王聽是經時，隣國怨敵興如是念：『當具四兵壞彼國土。』
translation: Suppose there's a person who hears this sūtra and the enemies of neighboring countries think, 'Should he have four armies to destroy that land?'

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 以是經王威神力故，是時隣敵更有異怨，而來侵擾於其境界，多諸災變疫病流行。
translation: Because of the authoritative power of this sūtra king's supernormal power, there were neighboring enemies and other different enemies who came to disturb his territory, causing numerous calamities, changes, epidemics, and epidemics to spread.

source_sentence: 時王見已即嚴四兵，發向彼國欲為討罰。
translation: Seeing this, the king then gathered his four armies and sent them to that country in order to punish him.

source_sentence: 我等爾時當與眷屬無量無邊藥叉諸神，各自隱形為作護助，令彼怨敵自然降伏，
translation: At that time, we and the innumerable other yakṣa spirits who belonged to the assembly will each go into hiding to protect us so that those enemies may naturally be vanquished.

source_sentence: 尚不敢來至其國界，豈復得有兵戈相罰。」
translation: I wouldn't dare to come to their borders, so how could I be punished by a soldier with a spear?

source_sentence: 爾時，佛告四天王：「善哉！
translation: It was then that the Buddha addressed the four celestial kings, Good!

source_sentence: 善哉！
translation: Excellent, good!

source_sentence: 汝等四王，乃能擁護如是經典。
translation: Only you four kings will be able to protect this kind of scripture.

source_sentence: 我於過去百千俱胝那庾多劫，修諸苦行，得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，證一切智，
translation: “For hundreds of thousands of millions of eons in the past I practiced austerities and attained unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment, realizing omniscience.

source_sentence: 今說是法。
translation: Now, I'll explain this teaching.

source_sentence: 若有人王受持是經，恭敬供養者，為消衰患，令其安隱，亦復擁護城邑聚落，
translation: If there is anyone among the kings who receives this scripture and venerates and makes offerings to it, he will remove the danger of decay and make them feel at ease. He will also protect towns and villages.

source_sentence: 乃至怨賊悉令退散，亦令一切贍部洲內所有諸王，永無衰惱鬪諍之事。
translation: It will cause all enemies and thieves to retreat, and it will also cause all the kings of Jambudvīpa to never be subject to debilitating fighting.

source_sentence: 四王當知！
translation: The four kings should know!

source_sentence: 此贍部洲八萬四千城邑聚落、八萬四千諸人王等，各於其國受諸快樂，
translation: In Jambudvīpa, there were eighty-four thousand cities, towns, kingdoms, and the eighty-four thousand inhabitants, each experiencing various pleasures in their own country.

source_sentence: 皆得自在，所有財寶豐足受用，不相侵奪，隨彼宿因而受其報，不起惡念貪求他國，
translation: They all attain mastery over their possessions, are abundant in riches and treasures, and enjoy the benefits of each other’s goods without taking them away from one another.

source_sentence: 咸生少欲利樂之心，無有鬪戰繫縛等苦。
translation: They all give rise to a mind with few desires for profit and pleasure, and there's no such pain as fighting, fetters, or bonds.

source_sentence: 其土人民自生愛樂，上下和穆，猶如水乳，情相愛重，歡喜遊戲，慈悲謙讓，
translation: The people of that land naturally cherished pleasure, and the up and down were harmonious and peaceful like water and milk. They cherished feelings of affection for each other with joy and played happily. They were compassionate and humble in

source_sentence: 增長善根。
translation: It grows the good roots.

source_sentence: 以是因緣，此贍部洲安隱豐樂，人民熾盛，大地沃壤，寒暑調和，時不乖序，
translation: Because of these causes and conditions, Jambudvfpa is peaceful and prosperous. The inhabitants are vigorous and the land is fertile; the cold and heat are temperate and the seasons are not at odds with each other.

source_sentence: 日月星宿常度無虧，風雨隨時，離諸災橫，資產財寶皆悉豐盈，心無慳鄙，
translation: The sun, moon, stars, and constellations always pass through without fail. They are free from calamity at all times when the wind blows and rainstorms blow. All their wealth and possessions are abundant; they have no stinginess in

source_sentence: 常行慧施，具十善業，若人命終，多生天上，增益天眾。
translation: He always practices the gift of wisdom and possesses ten kinds of good actions. If someone dies, they'll often be born in heaven and increase the number of gods there.

source_sentence: 大王！
translation: Great king!

source_sentence: 若未來世有諸人王聽受是經，恭敬供養并受持是經，四部之眾尊重稱讚。
translation: If there will be people in the future who hear and accept this sūtra, venerate it, make offerings to it, and retain it, the four groups of people will respect and praise it.

source_sentence: 復欲安樂饒益汝等及諸眷屬無量百千諸藥叉眾，是故彼王常當聽受是妙經王，
translation: Because he also wishes to bring peace and comfort to you and your retinues, innumerable hundreds of thousands of myriads of yakṣas. That is why the king should always listen to and accept this subtle scripture as king.

source_sentence: 由得聞此正法之水甘露上味，增益汝等身心勢力，精進勇猛，福德威光悉令充滿。
translation: As a result of hearing this sweet, delicious taste of the water of the true teaching, you will increase your physical and mental strength, become more energetic and courageous, and be filled with the majestic radiance of virtue.

source_sentence: 是諸人王若能至心聽受是經，則為廣大希有供養，供養於我釋迦牟尼應、正等覺。
translation: If these people kings of men could wholeheartedly hear and accept this sūtra, then they would make a vast and rare offering to me, Śākyamuni, the Arhat and Completely Awakened One.

source_sentence: 若供養我，則是供養過去、未來、現在百千俱胝那庾多佛。
translation: If someone makes offerings to me, they're making offerings to hundreds of thousands of koṭis of buddhas in the past, future, and present.

source_sentence: 若能供養三世諸佛，則得無量不可思議功德之聚。
translation: If someone can make offerings to the buddhas of the three times, they'll attain an immeasurable and inconceivable stock of merit.

source_sentence: 以是因緣，汝等應當擁護彼王后妃眷屬，令無衰惱，及宮宅神常受安樂，
translation: Because of these causes and conditions, you should protect the queen and their retinues so that they won't be harmed, and the palace spirits will always experience peace and happiness.

source_sentence: 功德難思，是諸國土所有人民，亦受種種五欲之樂，一切惡事皆令消殄。」
translation: Their merits are inconceivable, for all the people of these lands also experience various pleasures of the five desires and cause all bad things to be eliminated.

source_sentence: 爾時，四天王白佛言：「世尊！

source_sentence: 於未來世，若有人王，樂聽如是《金光明經》，為欲擁護自身、后妃、王子，
translation: In the future, if there are any kings who delight in listening to such scriptures of golden light and want to protect themselves, their queens, princes, and princes,

source_sentence: 乃至內宮諸婇女等，城邑宮殿，皆得第一不可思議最上歡喜寂靜安樂，
translation: And all the court ladies in the inner sanctum, as well as the palace ladies of the city and its quarters, attained the supreme bliss that is unfathomable.

source_sentence: 於現世中，王位尊高，自在昌盛，常得增長，復欲攝受無量無邊難思福聚，
translation: In the present world, the throne of kingship will be honorable and sovereign, flourishing freely. It will always grow in strength. Again, wishing to collect immeasurable, limitless, and inconceivable accumulations of merit

source_sentence: 於自國土令無怨敵及諸憂惱災厄事者。
translation: He causes the absence of enemies in his own land and the absence of sorrow, misfortune, and disasters.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 如是人王不應放逸令心散亂，當生恭敬至誠殷重，聽受如是最勝經王。
translation: Thus, the king of humans shouldn't be careless and cause their minds to become distracted, and they should give rise to respect, sincerity, and reverence and listen to such a most excellent sūtra king.

source_sentence: 欲聽之時，先當莊嚴最上宮室，王所愛重顯敞之處，香水灑地，散眾名花，
translation: When he wishes to hear it, he should first adorn the most distinguished palace. The king’s delight is expressed in the lofty space where fragrant water is sprinkled on the ground and various kinds of flowers are scattered

source_sentence: 安置師子殊勝法座，以諸珍寶而為挍飾，張施種種寶蓋幢幡，燒無價香，
translation: He placed the lion on a supreme seat of teaching, adorned it with jewels and ornaments, offered various precious canopies, banners, and streamers, and burned priceless incense.

source_sentence: 奏諸音樂。
translation: He played all the music.

source_sentence: 其王爾時當淨澡浴，以香塗身，著新淨衣及諸瓔珞，坐小卑座，不生高舉，
translation: At that time the king was to bathe himself cleanly, anoint his body with scented oil, put on fresh, clean clothes and jewelry, and sat on a humble seat, not rising up high.

source_sentence: 捨自在位，離諸憍慢，端心正念，聽是經王；
translation: Having renounced sovereignty, they are free from arrogance and conceit. They listen attentively to this king of scriptures.

source_sentence: 於法師所，起大師想。
translation: At the place where the Master was staying, he gave rise to the idea of a great teacher.

source_sentence: 復於宮內后妃王子婇女眷屬生慈愍心，喜悅相視，和顏軟語，於自身心大喜充遍。
translation: Again, the queens, princes, princes, court ladies, and their retinues within the palace became compassionate, looked at each other joyfully, spoke softly with a peaceful countenance, and were filled with great joy in their own mind

source_sentence: 作如是念：『我今獲得難思殊勝廣大利益，於此經王，盛興供養。』
translation: They think, 'Now that I've attained an inconceivably great and vast benefit, the king of this sūtra will flourish in offerings.'

source_sentence: 既敷設已，見法師至，當起虔敬渴仰之心。」
translation: Once you've prepared it, when you see the arrival of the Dharma teacher, you must give rise to a mind of reverence and veneration.

source_sentence: 爾時，佛告四天王：「不應如是不迎法師。
translation: It was then that the Buddha addressed the four celestial kings, You shouldn't thus fail to greet the Dharma teacher.

source_sentence: 時彼人王應著純淨鮮潔之衣，種種瓔珞以為嚴飾，自持白蓋及以香花，
translation: The king of the people then should wear pure and clean clothes, adorned with various jewelry, carry white canopies and fragrant flowers.

source_sentence: 備整軍儀，盛陳音樂，步出城闕迎彼法師，運想虔恭為吉祥事。
translation: The army was well prepared and music was abundant. They marched out of the city to greet the Master on foot, thinking that it was an auspicious occasion for him to be pious and respectful.

source_sentence: 四王！
translation: The four kings!

source_sentence: 以何因緣令彼人王親作如是恭敬供養？
translation: What causes and conditions would cause that person's king to personally make such a respectful offering?

source_sentence: 由彼人王舉足下足，步步即是恭敬供養、承事尊重百千萬億那庾多諸佛世尊，
translation: Because the king of humans raised their feet and lowered them, each step honoring and venerating hundreds of thousands of myriads of koṭis of nayutas of buddhas.

source_sentence: 復得超越如是劫數生死之苦，復於來世如是劫數，當受輪王殊勝尊位。
translation: They'll again be able to transcend the suffering of birth-and-death for eons like this, and in future lives like this, they'll experience the wheel-turning king's superior position as a wheel-turning king.

source_sentence: 隨其步步，亦於現世福德增長自在為王，感應難思，眾所欽重；
translation: Each step was also the sovereign over the accumulation of merit and virtue in the present life. Their responses were inconceivable and highly esteemed by all beings.

source_sentence: 當於無量百千億劫人天受用七寶宮殿，所在生處常得為王，增益壽命，
translation: In the course of innumerable hundreds of thousands of myriadstical koṭis of world ages, they will receive palaces decorated with the seven jewels. Wherever they are born, they will always be kings and increase their longevity

translation: They speak eloquently and eloquently, being accepted by gods and humans. They are free from fear and greatly renowned. All look up to them and admire them. Gods and humans alike experience supreme bliss.

source_sentence: 獲大力勢，有大威德，身相奇妙，端嚴無比，值天人師，遇善知識，成就具足無量福聚。

translation: Because of these various immeasurable merits and benefits, those kings of people should go there themselves to greet the Dharma teacher.

translation: If, for one yojana or so, up to a hundred thousand yojanas, you give rise to the thought of buddhahood in regard to the Dharma preacher, and when you return to the city, you think:

source_sentence: 受我供養，為我說法。
translation: Accept my offerings and teach me the Dharma.

source_sentence: 我聞法已，即於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提不復退轉，即是值遇百千萬億那庾多諸佛世尊。
translation: Having heard the teaching, I'll then attain unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment without further retrogression, which is to say, I'll meet hundreds of thousands of millions of billions of world-honored buddhas.

source_sentence: 我於今日即是種種廣大殊勝上妙樂具，供養過去、未來、現在諸佛。
translation: Today, that is, I'll present various vast and extraordinarily wonderful implements of great joy to the buddhas of the past, future, and present.

source_sentence: 我於今日即是永拔琰摩王界、地獄、餓鬼、傍生之苦。
translation: Today, I will permanently remove the suffering of the realm of King Yama, hells, hungry ghosts, and unenlightened creatures.

source_sentence: 便為已種無量百千萬億轉輪聖王、釋梵天主善根種子。
translation: They've planted measureless hundreds of thousands of myriads of koṭis of seeds of good roots for the wheel-turning sage king and Brahmā Śakra Devānām-Indra.

source_sentence: 當令無量百千萬億眾生，出生死苦，得涅槃樂，積集無量無邊不可思議福德之聚，

translation: That person king should thus revere the right teaching and also accept and uphold this wonderful scripture for monks, nuns, upāsaka, and upāsikā.

translation: They are offered support, respected, venerated, honored, and praised, and the good roots they attain are first given to you and your retinues with superior merit.

translation: All enemies can be subjugated by the right teaching.

source_sentence: 最勝經王亦復然，　　能與人王勝功德。
translation: The supreme sūtra king is likewise, able to match the human king's superior qualities.

source_sentence: 譬如澄潔清冷水，　　能除飢渴諸熱惱；
translation: It’s like clear, pure, cool water Able to remove hunger and thirst as well as feverish distress.

source_sentence: 最勝經王亦復然，　　令樂福者心滿足。
translation: The supreme king of the scriptures is likewise, Causing those who delight in virtue to fulfill their aspirations.

source_sentence: 如人室有妙寶篋，　　隨所受用悉從心；
translation: Like a man’s room with a beautiful jeweled door, All he receives and uses according to his heart.

source_sentence: 最勝經王亦復然，　　福德隨心無所乏。
translation: So it is with the supreme king of scriptures, whose virtues follow his mind without lack.

source_sentence: 汝等天主及天眾，　　應當供養此經王；
translation: All of you lords of gods and celestial beings should pay homage to this king of scriptures.

source_sentence: 若能依教奉持經，　　智慧威神皆具足。
translation: If someone can rely on the teaching and uphold the sūtras, their wisdom and authoritative power are all present.

source_sentence: 現在十方一切佛，　　咸共護念此經王；
translation: All the buddhas of the ten directions now Protect this king of scriptures.

source_sentence: 見有讀誦及受持，　　稱歎善哉甚希有。
translation: Seeing someone who recites and retains it, he praises its goodness as rare.

source_sentence: 若有人能聽此經，　　身心踊躍生歡喜；
translation: If there is anyone who can hear this sutra, They’ll dance and rejoice in body and mind.

source_sentence: 常有百千藥叉眾，　　隨所住處護斯人。
translation: Hundreds of thousands of myriadstical yakṣas always protect these people Wherever they live.

source_sentence: 於此世界諸天眾，　　其數無量不思議；
translation: The celestial beings in this world Are countless and inconceivable in number.

source_sentence: 悉共聽受此經王，　　歡喜護持無退轉。
translation: They all listened to and accepted this scripture with joy, preserving it without retreating.

source_sentence: 若人聽受此經王，　　威德勇猛常自在；
translation: If anyone hears and accepts this king of scriptures, His mighty virtue and courage will always be unimpeded.

source_sentence: 增益一切人天眾，　　令離衰惱益光明。」
translation: They will increase all the sentient beings and gods, cause them to be freed from their afflictions and gain light.

source_sentence: 四天王讚歎佛已，世尊亦以伽他而答之曰：爾時四天王聞是頌已，歡喜踊躍，
translation: Having praised the Buddha, the four guardian gods of heaven also sang these verses: The World-honored One answered them in verse:

source_sentence: 白佛言：「世尊！
translation: He said to the Buddha, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我從昔來未曾得聞如是甚深微妙之法。」
translation: Since the distant past, I've never heard such a profound and subtle teaching.

source_sentence: 心生悲喜，涕淚交流，舉身戰動，證不思議希有之事，以天曼陀羅花、摩訶曼陀羅花而散佛上。
translation: With sorrow and joy in their hearts, weeping and wailing, they lifted their bodies and trembled. Realizing this inconceivable rare thing, they scattered heavenly māndārava flowers and mahāmandārava

source_sentence: 作是殊勝供養佛已，白佛言：「世尊！
translation: After making these extraordinary offerings to the Buddha, he said to him, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等四王各有五百藥叉眷屬，常當處處擁護是經及說法師，以智光明而為助衛。
translation: Each of our four kings has five hundred yakṣa followers, who will always guard this sūtra and the expounders of the Dharma in every place. They will be assisted by us with the light of knowledge to protect it.

source_sentence: 若於此經所有句義忘失之處，我皆令彼憶念不忘，并與陀羅尼殊勝法門令得具足。
translation: If someone forgets the words and meanings of this sūtra, I'll cause them to remember them without forgetting them, and I'll give them the extraordinary dharma-gate of the dhāraṇī so they'll attain their fulfillment.

source_sentence: 復欲令此最勝經王所在之處，為諸眾生廣宣流布，不速隱沒。」
translation: I also want to make this most excellent sūtra king wherever he is, so that it's widely disseminated for sentient beings and doesn't quickly disappear.

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊於大眾中說是法時，無量眾生皆得大智聰叡辯才，攝受無量福德之聚，
translation: At the time, when the Bhagavān was teaching this teaching to the masses, measureless sentient beings all attained great knowledge, wisdom, intelligence, and eloquence, gathering in an immeasurable stock of merit.

source_sentence: 離諸憂惱，發喜樂心，善明眾論，登出離道，不復退轉，速證菩提。
translation: Being free of sorrow and afflictions, he arouses a mind of joy and happiness, skillfully explains the various theories, ascends and leaves the path, doesn't retreat again, and quickly realizes enlightenment.

source_sentence: 金光明最勝王經卷第六
translation: Sutra of the Most Excellent King of Golden Light, Volume 6
